name: Path N Heart Mediastinum
title: Pathologic N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS in this fields.  Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis.

**Note 2:**  Regional lymph nodes are defined as those in the vicinity of the primary tumor.

**Note 3:**   Regional lymph node involvement is rare.  For this schema, if there is no mention of lymph node involvement clinically, assume that lymph nodes are negative.  Assign NX only when there is no available information on the extent of the patient's disease, for example when a lab-only case is abstracted from a biopsy report and no clinical history is available.

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Aortic (above diaphragm), NOS:
        Peri/para-aortic, NOS
            Ascending aorta (phrenic)
        Subaortic (aortico-pulmonary window)
    Carinal (tracheobronchial) (tracheal bifurcation)
    Mediastinal, NOS:
        Anterior
        Posterior (tracheoesophageal)
    Pericardial
    Peri/paraesophageal
    Peri/paratracheal, NOS:
        Azygos (lower peritracheal)
    Pre- and retrotracheal, NOS:
        Precarinal
    Pulmonary ligament
    Subcarinal
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Surgical resection of primary and pathologic assessment of regional nodes are done but involvement of regional nodes not stated
Surgical resection of primary and pathologic assessment of regional nodes are done but involvement of regional nodes not documented in patient record

Regional lymph node(s), NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
Clinically no nodes positive and no pathologic evaluation of nodes
In situ case as defined by TNM and there is a resection of the primary but the nodes are not evaluated pathologically

Pathologic N is not defined for the specific site/histology
In situ case but no pTis is defined by TNM

No pathologic evaluation of regional lymph nodes and case is not in situ
Regional lymph node(s) cannot be assessed pathologically
No resection of a known primary (not T0)
No surgical resection of primary tumor and no positive biopsy of the highest N 
Unknown if any pathologic assessment performed
